Biggest Gyms

Our gyms come with a variety of apparatus equipment for all athletes. Including 250 cardio, strength, resistance and functional machines, basketball and tennis courts as well as a swimming pool.

Best Programs

About Lloyd Fitness

Lloyd Fitness was founded by Jordan Lloyd in 2019 during his body-building days. Having found other mentor advice to be unworthy, Jordan envisioned Lloyd Fitness as the #1 go-to place for fitness enthusiasts. Now the organisation serves different training grounds for people around the UK for those trying to take their fitness to the next level.

Lloyd Fitness will be taking its next-steps towards becoming a global gym whereby 26 new locations are set to be open in 2020.
